name: Tokemak
description: Tokemak is a protocol designed to generate deep, sustainable liquidity for DeFi. It is a decentralized market making platform and liquidity router that disaggregates traditional liquidity provision and market making for DeFi.

en.name: Tokemak
en.description: Tokemak is a protocol designed to generate deep, sustainable liquidity for DeFi. It is a decentralized market making platform and liquidity router that disaggregates traditional liquidity provision and market making for DeFi.

fr.name: Tokemak
fr.description: Tokemak est un protocole conçu pour générer une liquidité profonde et durable dans l'écosystème DeFi. Il s'agit d'une plate-forme de création de marché décentralisée ainsi que d'un routeur de liquidité qui désagrège l'apport de liquidité traditionnel et la création de marché pour la DeFi.

es.name: Tokemak
es.description: Tokemak es un protocolo diseñado para generar una liquidez profunda y sostenible para DeFi. Es una plataforma de creación de mercado descentralizada y un enrutador de liquidez que desagrega la provisión de liquidez tradicional y la creación de mercado para DeFi.

de.name: Tokemak
de.description: Tokemak is a protocol designed to generate deep, sustainable liquidity for DeFi. It is a decentralized market making platform and liquidity router that disaggregates traditional liquidity provision and market making for DeFi.

pt.name: Tokemak
pt.description: Tokemak é um protocolo designado para gerar grande e sustentável liquidez para DeFi. É uma plataforma de criação de mercado descentralizada, e um roteador de liquidez que desagraga a provisão de liquidez e criação de mercados tradicionais no DeFi.

el.name: Tokemak
el.description: Tokemak is a protocol designed to generate deep, sustainable liquidity for DeFi. It is a decentralized market making platform and liquidity router that disaggregates traditional liquidity provision and market making for DeFi.

tr.name: Tokemak
tr.description: Tokemak, DeFi için derin, sürdürülebilir likidite oluşturmak üzere tasarlanmış bir protokoldür. DeFi için geleneksel likidite tedarikini ve piyasa yapımını ayrıştıran merkezi olmayan bir piyasa yapma platformu ve likidite yönlendiricisidir.

vi.name: Tokemak
vi.description: Tokemak is a protocol designed to generate deep, sustainable liquidity for DeFi. It is a decentralized market making platform and liquidity router that disaggregates traditional liquidity provision and market making for DeFi.

zh.name: Tokemak
zh.description: Tokemak 为 DeFi 提供有深度、可持续的流动性。Tokemak 是一个去中心化做市商平台，通过路由器的方式提供流动性，打破了传统的流动性提供方式和 DeFi 的做市商方式。
